summary_detail.value: Sheriff Dutton has now ordered the evacuation of homes on the north and south side of Highway 200 from Elk Meadows, east to the South Fork of the Dearborn river. Fire officials and law enforcement are preparing for the Ellis Creek fire to make a run toward Highway 200 on the east side of Rogers Pass. This is Highway 200, mile marker 92 to approximately mile marker

title: Evacuation of Homes HWY 200 from Elk Meadows to S. Fork Dearborn River (Alice Creek Fire Wildfire)
